name: Nurse
description: Professional telehealth consultations for work, school, and carer's leave certificates. Fast, compliant, and includes digital certificate delivery for immediate documentation needs.

name: Midwife
description: Comprehensive telehealth support for antenatal and postnatal care, including birth planning, maternal health assessment, and baby development guidance.

name: Pharmacist
description: Expert telehealth consultations for medication advice, prescription management, and pharmaceutical care, including chronic condition support.

name: Physiotherapist
description: Specialized telehealth sessions for musculoskeletal assessment, rehabilitation guidance, and exercise-based recovery programs.

name: Psychologist
description: Expert telehealth psychological care and support services. Comprehensive assessments, therapy sessions, and guidance for mental health needs.

name: General Medical Practitioner
description: Expert telehealth general medical care services for a wide range of health concerns. Comprehensive assessments, consultations, and support for your needs.

name: Dietitian
description: Expert telehealth nutrition and dietary advice services. Comprehensive assessments, personalized meal plans, and support for your nutritional needs.

name: Social Worker
description: Expert telehealth social support and mental health care services. Comprehensive assessments, therapy sessions, and support for your needs.

name: Exercise Physiologist
description: Expert telehealth exercise physiology services for physical activity and rehabilitation. Comprehensive assessments, personalized exercise programs, and support for your needs.

name: Speech Pathologist
description: Expert telehealth speech therapy services for communication and swallowing concerns. Comprehensive assessments, therapy sessions, and support for your needs.
